text: They are nice and prompt but the food is almost slways cold and sometimes under cooked. If you want pizza around this area order from dominos the staff isn’t as nice but the food is warm.

text: Delivery times can take anywhere from 30 minutes to 2 hours (I live 3 miles away).  Pizza is generally lukewarm at best and taste is hit or miss.  With the the new crust and sauce toppings, I have 50% success rate of actually getting the …More

text: Food is okay. Prices are fine but food could be better.

text: Ordered $65.00 worth of pizza and wings and the thin crust pizzas were overdone and almost not edible. Wings were overdone also. I would have taken them back but it was late. I will never order pizza therw again. Two thumbs down.

text: SLOW. Delivery and in store is so slow. Also seems like they just throw together pizza sloppily. Staff just plain does not care.

text: There is inconsistent service. Sometimes the food is normal, sometimes it is undercooked. How busy it is doesn't seem to be the reason for undercooked pizzas and breadsticks in the past. It has been hit or miss.
